text: Douglas A. "Ox" Baker (April 19, 1934 â€“ October 20, 2014) was an American professional wrestler and actor. He was famous for his finishing move, the Heart Punch, sometimes called the "Hurt Punch". He was also known for his famous catchphrase "I love to hurt people!" He has appeared in several movies including Blood Circus and Escape from New York. Baker died in Hartford, Connecticut on October 20, 2014, due to complications from a heart attack. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1934 births Category:2014 deaths Category:Deaths from myocardial infarction Category:American professional wrestlers Category:American movie actors Category:Actors from Missouri
title: Ox Baker
